main event: A bright light was observed in the sky at an altitude of about 45 degrees for several minutes behind some clouds near New Carlisle, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 3 May 65 at 0535Z,The observer was located on a farm 5 miles east of New Carlisle,The object faded away into haze during the observation,The observer noted the light's color as yellowish white,There were no photographs or physical evidence documented for this sighting.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: the observer was at a farm
